post.description: Submits an MFA verification code to retrieve a signToken.

**Deprecated**

This method is deprecated and will be removed in future API versions. Use [`POST /v3/auth/token`](/api-reference/endpoint/post-v3-auth-token) instead.

**Deprecated**

This method is deprecated and will be removed in future API versions. Use [`PUT /v3/auth/token`](/api-reference/endpoint/put-v3-auth-token) instead.

notice.iban: It looks like you entered an invalid IBAN number.

get.description: List of events you can sign up for

bank_country.description: 2-char code of country.⚠ REQUIRED if the currency is not EUR

bic_swift.description: BIC\SWIFT number. ⚠ NOT REQUIRED if SEPA

account_number.description: ⚠ REQUIRED if the currency is GBP and bank_details_type is local

sort_code.description: ⚠ REQUIRED if the bank_details_type is local

street.description: Beneficiary address street. ⚠ REQUIRED if the currency is not EUR

house.description: Beneficiary house number. ⚠ REQUIRED if the currency is not EUR

city.description: Beneficiary city. ⚠ REQUIRED if the currency is not EUR

country_id.description: Alpha-2 country code. ⚠ REQUIRED if the currency is not EUR

postal_code.description: Beneficiary postal code. ⚠ REQUIRED if the currency is not EUR

first_name.description: Beneficiary first name. ⚠ REQUIRED if entity_type is 'individual'

last_name.description: Beneficiary last name. ⚠ REQUIRED if entity_type is 'individual'

beneficiaryId.description: ⚠ NOT REQUIRED if target_wallet_id is set

targetWalletId.description: ⚠ NOT USE if beneficiary_id is set

reference.description: ⚠ NOT REQUIRED if target_wallet_id is set

purposeCode.description: ⚠ REQUIRED when beneficiary country is UAE

files.description: ⚠ NOT REQUIRED if target_wallet_id is set

canSetSmsBalanceNotification.description: User can manage card payment balance sms notification

canGetOperations.description: User can get card operation flags

canSetOperations.description: User can update card operation flags

isSmsBalanceNotification.description: Is Payment Balance Sms Notification Enabled

enabled.description: Is the operation enabled/disabled switch is available

example.id: The provided 'ID' is not a valid UUID.

Enter a field name to sort by (with a minus to sort desc):

  id: sort asc
  -id: sort desc
